job description:
Description

: Purpose of Position: To provide data and catalog support of all product lines functions to specified accounts. Key Responsibilities B Channel (Program Distribution) Accounts •Produce and submit annual and quarterly price files for submission to customers •Coordinate product placement and layout for annual catalogs and quarterly flyers •Responsible for providing new product information for authoring files•Leads quarterly corporate product line review meetings•Participate in quarterly product classification reviews •Administer outside sales team incentive programs •Coordinate quarterly outside sales team mailings•Research and resolve end user rebate disputes•Facilitates annual stock adjustment returns •Assist with solutions to service problems•Special projects as required Relationships This position will interface with sales, engineering, manufacturing, customerservice, field service, and finance. Measurers of Performance Sales of assigned accounts and supplier score card (all product lines)



Qualifications

: Background and Skill •B.S. or B.A. in relevant field of study; marketing, engineering or business required•2-4 years experience in purchasing, accounting, marketing, business to business environment and understanding of distribution channels. •Ability to perform in a lean, cross-functional, team oriented environment. •Extensive skills in MS Excel, Word, and PowerPoint. •Exceptionally strong customer service skills.
